import { Image } from "astro:assets";
import img from "../../../assets/preview.png";

The default theme. Requires a Nerd Font for some of the symbols.

## Preview

<Image src={img} width={800} alt="" />

## Config

```rust
#![enable(implicit_some)]
#![enable(unwrap_newtypes)]
#![enable(unwrap_variant_newtypes)]
(
    album_art_position: Left,
    album_art_width_percent: 40,
    draw_borders: true,
    symbols: (song: "üéµ", dir: "üìÅ", marker: "\u{e0b0}"),
    progress_bar: (
        symbols: ["‚ñà", "\u{e0b0}", "‚ñà"],
        track_style: (fg: "#1e2030"),
        elapsed_style: (fg: "blue"),
        thumb_style: (fg: "blue", bg: "#1e2030"),
    ),
    scrollbar: (
        symbols: ["‚îÇ", "‚ñà", "‚ñ≤", "‚ñº"],
        track_style: (),
        ends_style: (),
        thumb_style: (fg: "blue"),
    ),
    browser_column_widths: [20, 38, 42],
    background_color: None,
    header_background_color: None,
    modal_background_color: None,
    active_tab_style: (fg: "black", bg: "blue", modifiers: "Bold"),
    inactive_tab_style: (),
    borders_style: (fg: "blue"),
    highlighted_item_style: (fg: "blue", modifiers: "Bold"),
    current_item_style: (fg: "black", bg: "blue", modifiers: "Bold"),
    highlight_border_style: (fg: "blue"),
    show_song_table_header: true,
    song_table_format: [
        (
            prop: (kind: Property(Artist), default: (kind: Text(value: "Unknown"))),
            width_percent: 20,
        ),
        (
            prop: (kind: Property(Title), default: (kind: Text(value: "Unknown"))),
            width_percent: 35,
        ),
        (
            prop: (kind: Property(Album), style: (fg: "white"), default: (kind: Text(value: "Album"), style: (fg: "white"))),
            width_percent: 30,
        ),
        (
            prop: (kind: Property(Duration), default: (kind: Text(value: "-"))),
            width_percent: 15,
            alignment: Right,
        ),
    ],
    header: (
        rows: [
            (
                left: [(kind: Text(value: "["), style: (fg: "yellow", modifiers: "Bold")), (kind: Property(Status(State)), style: (fg: "yellow", modifiers: "Bold")), (kind: Text(value: "]"), style: (fg: "yellow", modifiers: "Bold"))],
                center: [(kind: Property(Song(Title)), style: (modifiers: "Bold"), default: (kind: Text(value: "No Song"), style: (modifiers: "Bold")))],
                right: [(kind: Property(Widget(Volume)), style: (fg: "blue"))]
            ),
            (
                left: [(kind: Property(Status(Elapsed))), (kind: Text(value: " / ")), (kind: Property(Status(Duration))), (kind: Text(value: " (")), (kind: Property(Status(Bitrate))), (kind: Text(value: " kbps)"))],
                center: [(kind: Property(Song(Artist)), style: (fg: "yellow", modifiers: "Bold"), default: (kind: Text(value: "Unknown"), style: (fg: "yellow", modifiers: "Bold"))), (kind: Text(value: " - ")), (kind: Property(Song(Album)), default: (kind: Text(value: "Unknown Album")))],
                right: [(kind: Property(Widget(States(active_style: (fg: "white", modifiers: "Bold"), separator_style: (fg: "white")))), style: (fg: "dark_gray"))]
            ),
        ],
    ),
    default_album_art_path: None,
)
```
